name: Hell Crimes
description:
Hell Crimes is a point and click mystery game, where you play as Detective Dick Angel who has been tasked to solve the disappearance of a witch girl in Hell. The game presents the player with complex puzzles to try and solve the case, as this interactive and mature narrative is targeted at an audience of 16+. 

Will you be able to crack the mystery?

This game was made in just over a week in June of 2021, and was submitted as an exam game. All assets and programming were made by myself.
